introduction.p: The eight basic functions are often used as models.

statement.p: Which of the eight basic functions are always increasing?
Which of the eight basic functions are concave up for positive x?
Which of the eight basic functions are undefined at x=0?
Which of the eight basic functions are always non-negative?

introduction.p: Here are some useful formulas often used in models.

statement.p: Write a formula for the volume of a rectangular box, and identify the variables.

solution.p: V stands for volume, and l,~w, and h stand for, respectively, the length, width, and height of the box.

statement.p: Write a formula for the average of a number of scores, and identify the variables.

solution.p: A stands for the average, S stands for the sum of the scores, and n stands for the number of scores.
